job_tasks.phrase: Fine-tune AI/ML models to achieve the best response quality
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the process of adjusting existing AI/ML models to improve their performance, which is a core aspect of model training and adaptation.

job_tasks.phrase: Build vehicle assistant response quality evaluation tools
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation of tools, which implies software development to build functional applications.
This phrase explicitly mentions the construction and enhancement of data pipelines, which falls under data engineering responsibilities.
Dashboards are typically software components that require development to display data and insights.

job_tasks.phrase: Build and improve ... other internal tools
job_tasks.justification: The creation of 'tools' indicates software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in reviews of requirements, technical design, and code
job_tasks.justification: Participating in reviews necessitates communication and collaboration with team members on technical aspects.
This points to the responsibility of managing and keeping live systems operational, which is a key part of MLOps.
Being on-call is a direct indicator of involvement in production support and operational responsibilities.

soft_skills.phrase: Participate in reviews of requirements, technical design, and code
Build and improve data pipelines, dashboards, and other internal tools
Develop and maintain production systems including being on-call

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes fine-tuning AI/ML models and building tools for quality evaluation, aligning with core ML Engineer responsibilities. The inclusion of developing and maintaining production systems, including being on-call, strongly indicates MLOps experience, a key component of the ML Engineer profile.
